text: avarkk prayēājanakaramāya raṅgaṅṅaḷil avar sannihitarākuvānuṁ, allāhu avarkk nalkiyiṭṭuḷḷa nālkāli mr̥gaṅṅaḷe niścita divasaṅṅaḷil avanṟe nāmaṁ uccariccu keāṇṭ balikaḻikkānuṁ vēṇṭiyatre at‌. aṅṅane avayil ninn niṅṅaḷ tinnukayuṁ, paravaśanuṁ daridranumāyiṭṭuḷḷavan bhakṣikkān keāṭukkukayuṁ ceyyuka
